channel.title: SBox
channel.description:
Hello, Like in stupids scripts when you press begin, the box comes up with all the details in it, as it does In Starblaster100 Stress Minner i think, i was wondering how i can do that, i need it to be a small box about this big :
.____________________. | -Extra Setup- | | Bones To Burry:[1000]| | Spaces In Inven: [28] | | | |(Help) (Charicter) (o.k) | |____________________|
and the part with 1000 and 28 are boxes to type in
HELP ._____________. | >help< | | bla la avbla | < a scroll bar here if possible | bla la avbla | | bla la avbla | | bla la avbla | | bla la avbla | | bla la avbla |
CHARICTER
.________________. |Username[blabla] | |Password[****] | | (O.K) | |_______________ |
and you should get the rest, if your smart :|
if anyone could supply help for that, i will jump the moon with thanks :) ++ rank if im alloud :)
~©ristle~

item.title: SBox
item.dc:creator: @_ristle ©ristle
item.description:
@_ristle wrote:

lol, thanks its actually ©ristle, you hold down the alt key then press 0,1,6,9 then let go of alt and you get the © i read them no and are making them in scar form creator thingie magigey

~©ristle~

Yep. Ristle, you definitely should check out those tutorials by Mad Cow. If you want to learn how to make and use forms to/in your scripts…

item.title: SBox
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

…Erm. Then why did you ask…? If you knew already. Kinda… Confusing?

Anyways, shame you, ristle. Didn’t even thank him(Kane) about his help. EVEN though, you already knew about forms. But, as he was just trying to help you, you should thank him. It is a good habit to thank people. Especially if they answer your questions.

-Janilabo

Read full topic
